messages.content: ComfyUI-MimicMotionWrapper is a custom node for ComfyUI that wraps the MimicMotion model, allowing users to generate videos from images using the stable video diffusion model.
To install ComfyUI-MimicMotionWrapper, clone the repo into the custom_nodes folder and install dependencies by running `pip install -r requirements.txt` or using the portable install command.
Where are the models for ComfyUI-MimicMotionWrapper auto-downloaded?

The models for ComfyUI-MimicMotionWrapper are auto-downloaded to their respective folders: SVD XT in `\ComfyUI\models\diffusers\stable-video-diffusion-img2vid-xt-1-1` and MimicMotion in `ComfyUI\models\mimicmotion`.
What is the size of the MimicMotion model?
The MimicMotion model is 3.05 GB in size.
Which version of SVD XT is required for ComfyUI-MimicMotionWrapper?
ComfyUI-MimicMotionWrapper requires the Fp16 version (4.19 GB) of SVD XT 1.1, which should be placed in the `ComfyUI/models/diffusers` folder.
Where can you find the original repo for MimicMotion?
The original repo for MimicMotion is located at https://github.com/tencent/MimicMotion.
What is the purpose of using ComfyUI-MimicMotionWrapper in ComfyUI?
The purpose of using ComfyUI-MimicMotionWrapper in ComfyUI is to generate videos from images by utilizing the stable video diffusion model, specifically the MimicMotion model.
